trans-unit.source: Added an option to omit snapshot creation which defaults to True to speed up test runs and migrations. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Added functionality and tests from CMFPlone. Added uninstall profile. And no longer count on being installed by CMFPlone, especially in tests. Marked for Plone 5.2 as minimum version. This package is end-of-life. You should use

trans-unit.target: Added getProductDescription method to expose the description from an extension profile. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Added getattr code to make sure uninstall for products which have not been installed properly doesn’t fail that easily. [hannosch, wichert]
trans-unit.target: Added getattr code to make sure uninstall for products which have not been installed properly doesn’t fail that easily. [hannosch, wichert]

trans-unit.source: Added initialize code for all values in DEFAULT_CASCADE. Otherwise you could get errors during uninstall of products which where installed via notifyInstalled. [hannosch, wichert]
trans-unit.target: Added initialize code for all values in DEFAULT_CASCADE. Otherwise you could get errors during uninstall of products which where installed via notifyInstalled. [hannosch, wichert]

trans-unit.target: Added methods to display Products directory and debug mode (if enabled) [joelburton]

trans-unit.source: Added missing test dependency on Products.CMFCalendar. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Added missing test dependency on Products.CMFCalendar. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Added new listInstallableProfiles method, to include products without a Zope2 control panel entry in the listings. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Added new listInstallableProfiles method, to include products without a Zope2 control panel entry in the listings. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Added new profile argument to the installProduct method to explicitly set the profile which should be used for installation. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Added new profile argument to the installProduct method to explicitly set the profile which should be used for installation. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Added optional reinstall argument to install() and uninstall() method [tiran]
trans-unit.target: Added optional reinstall argument to install() and uninstall() method [tiran]

trans-unit.source: Added support for GenericSetup extension profile-based installation. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Added support for GenericSetup extension profile-based installation. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Added the INonInstallable interface that is used to look up utilities which provide a list of non-installable products. This allows applications to exclude certain products from the list of installable products. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Added the INonInstallable interface that is used to look up utilities which provide a list of non-installable products. This allows applications to exclude certain products from the list of installable products. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Added uninstall support for utilities. All additional utilities installed by a product are now recorded and uninstalled properly. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Added uninstall support for utilities. All additional utilities installed by a product are now recorded and uninstalled properly. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Adjusted actions installation tracking to work with CMF 2.1+. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Adjusted actions installation tracking to work with CMF 2.1+. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Adjusted installProduct method to be compatible with CMF 2.1 (including the conversion of tools as utilities). [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Adjusted installProduct method to be compatible with CMF 2.1 (including the conversion of tools as utilities). [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Adjusted listInstallable and listInstalled methods to return the title of the GenericSetup profile instead of the package name, for extension profile based installation. These look a lot nicer ;) This fixes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/6129. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Adjusted listInstallable and listInstalled methods to return the title of the GenericSetup profile instead of the package name, for extension profile based installation. These look a lot nicer ;) This fixes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/6129. [hannosch]

trans-unit.target: Allow to pass the option to skip certain steps to GenericSetup’s runAllImportStepsFromProfile. [pbauer]

trans-unit.source: Cache listInstallableProducts in event handler to improve portal creation time. [stefan]
trans-unit.target: Cache listInstallableProducts in event handler to improve portal creation time. [stefan]

trans-unit.source: Catch errors where the product is there but install cannot by compiled, this picks up syntax errors and adds the them to an errors dict. When listInstallableProducts is called, the errors dict is repoulated. Also added in a few except ConflictErrors. [andym]
trans-unit.target: Catch errors where the product is there but install cannot by compiled, this picks up syntax errors and adds the them to an errors dict. When listInstallableProducts is called, the errors dict is repoulated. Also added in a few except ConflictErrors. [andym]

trans-unit.target: Changed GS profile registration to be zcml based. Fixed some problems with the logging calls. Removed some stale code from the tests. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Disabled postonly protection for product reinstall. This broke the reinstall functionality on the Plone control panel. The postonly protection can be enabled once the control panel is changed. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Disabled postonly protection for product reinstall. This broke the reinstall functionality on the Plone control panel. The postonly protection can be enabled once the control panel is changed. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Display of add on products README file could generate UnicodeDecodeError when the README file included non-ascii characters. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/7524. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Display of add on products README file could generate UnicodeDecodeError when the README file included non-ascii characters. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/7524. [hannosch]

trans-unit.target: Fixed actions installation tests. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: QI doesn’t assign an object to a product when it is already registered for another product. This fixes bugs like the removal of the archetype tool when a product was removed which itself had had installed Archetypes. [tiran]
trans-unit.target: QI doesn’t assign an object to a product when it is already registered for another product. This fixes bugs like the removal of the archetype tool when a product was removed which itself had had installed Archetypes. [tiran]

trans-unit.source: QuickInstaller now also tracks entries in the content_type_registry.
trans-unit.target: QuickInstaller now also tracks entries in the content_type_registry.

trans-unit.source: QuickInstallerTool just tracks which objects are added, but not what is changed or deleted.
trans-unit.target: QuickInstallerTool just tracks which objects are added, but not what is changed or deleted.

trans-unit.target: Readded doctests which were not run after port to plone.app.testing [tomgross]

trans-unit.target: Refactored ResourceRegistries support not to require the product itself to be installed in QI. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Refactored common code to check and generate the external install methods into helper methods in utils. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Refactored common code to check and generate the external install methods into helper methods in utils. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Register test profile only when needed. Testcase change only. [gotcha]
trans-unit.target: Register test profile only when needed. Testcase change only. [gotcha]

trans-unit.source: Reinstall
trans-unit.target: Reinstall

trans-unit.source: Reinstalling a product invokes uninstall() and install(). If you have special code which should work differently on reinstall than uninstall/install you can add a second argument to the install or uninstall method named ‘reinstall’ which is true only for a reinstallation. In most cases you shouldn’t react differently when reinstalling!
trans-unit.target: Reinstalling a product invokes uninstall() and install(). If you have special code which should work differently on reinstall than uninstall/install you can add a second argument to the install or uninstall method named ‘reinstall’ which is true only for a reinstallation. In most cases you shouldn’t react differently when reinstalling!

trans-unit.source: Remove InstalledProduct instance when a product is uninstalled. Leaving the instance around can prevent settings from being stored properly on subsequent installation of the product. [rochecompaan]
trans-unit.target: Remove InstalledProduct instance when a product is uninstalled. Leaving the instance around can prevent settings from being stored properly on subsequent installation of the product. [rochecompaan]

trans-unit.source: Remove the except: pass from trying to make a External method, if there is an error in the import log the error to ZLOG. Unfortunately there is a string error we have to try and catch as well. That string error occurs when the module cant be found, so we should ignore that.
trans-unit.target: Remove the except: pass from trying to make a External method, if there is an error in the import log the error to ZLOG. Unfortunately there is a string error we have to try and catch as well. That string error occurs when the module cant be found, so we should ignore that.

trans-unit.source: Remove utility mapping in site manager’s dictionary to enable a complete uninstall. This fixes an issue where a cascade-based uninstall would not entirely remove utilities, but merely unregister them from the component registry.
trans-unit.target: Remove utility mapping in site manager’s dictionary to enable a complete uninstall. This fixes an issue where a cascade-based uninstall would not entirely remove utilities, but merely unregister them from the component registry.

trans-unit.source: Removed all error swallowing options from QuickInstaller. We always raise an error now, if one is encountered during product install. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/7536. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Removed all error swallowing options from QuickInstaller. We always raise an error now, if one is encountered during product install. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/7536. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Removed lots of unused and bbb code. This version requires at least CMF 1.6. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Removed lots of unused and bbb code. This version requires at least CMF 1.6. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Removed no longer needed check for CMF < 2.1. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Removed no longer needed check for CMF < 2.1. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Replaced all getToolByName calls by get/queryUtility. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Replaced all getToolByName calls by get/queryUtility. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Restored code which got accidentally removed in c38815. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Restored code which got accidentally removed in c38815. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Reverted getUtility usage. Closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/7314. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Reverted getUtility usage. Closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/7314. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Reworked the last bits of the install machinery to work without the product registry. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Reworked the last bits of the install machinery to work without the product registry. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Slightly optimize for GenericSetup profile based installations. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Slightly optimize for GenericSetup profile based installations. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Some general spring cleaning. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Some general spring cleaning. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: The addon/product ships with a GenericSetup extension profile (but has no install method as above). If there are multiple profiles the alphabetically first wins.
trans-unit.target: The addon/product ships with a GenericSetup extension profile (but has no install method as above). If there are multiple profiles the alphabetically first wins.

trans-unit.source: The getInstallMethod should ignore ImportError when looking for install methods for a product. This makes it possible to install products which have a working GenericSetup profile but a broken Install external method. [wichert]
trans-unit.target: The getInstallMethod should ignore ImportError when looking for install methods for a product. This makes it possible to install products which have a working GenericSetup profile but a broken Install external method. [wichert]

trans-unit.source: The requirements for a product to be installable with QuickInstallerTool are quite simple (almost all existing CMF products fulfill them):
trans-unit.target: The requirements for a product to be installable with QuickInstallerTool are quite simple (almost all existing CMF products fulfill them):

trans-unit.source: The same error should be displayed only once even if it occurs with the old style install method and with the GenericSetup profile [encolpe]
trans-unit.target: The same error should be displayed only once even if it occurs with the old style install method and with the GenericSetup profile [encolpe]

trans-unit.source: Therefore it has to be installed as a tool inside a CMF portal, where it stores the information about the installed products.
trans-unit.target: Therefore it has to be installed as a tool inside a CMF portal, where it stores the information about the installed products.

trans-unit.source: Updated package metadata and cleaned up old code. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Updated package metadata and cleaned up old code. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Updated the delete portalobjects method to NOT delete items that implement IContentish or IFolderish. This will help people who create custom products and put content containers at the root on install [eleddy]
trans-unit.target: Updated the delete portalobjects method to NOT delete items that implement IContentish or IFolderish. This will help people who create custom products and put content containers at the root on install [eleddy]

trans-unit.source: Usage
trans-unit.target: 용법

trans-unit.source: Use
trans-unit.target: 사용하다

trans-unit.source: Use aq_base on all attribute retrieval during InstalledProduct’s cascade deletion so we don’t inadvertently try to delete something retrieved via acquisition. [rafrombrc]
trans-unit.target: Use aq_base on all attribute retrieval during InstalledProduct’s cascade deletion so we don’t inadvertently try to delete something retrieved via acquisition. [rafrombrc]

trans-unit.source: Use aq_parent(aq_inner()) to get at the portal root, otherwise we can end up getting the quickinstaller tool by accident if it’s acquired through itself. [sidnei]
trans-unit.target: Use aq_parent(aq_inner()) to get at the portal root, otherwise we can end up getting the quickinstaller tool by accident if it’s acquired through itself. [sidnei]

trans-unit.source: Use new GenericSetup features, so we don’t have to change the current setup tool context anymore. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Use new GenericSetup features, so we don’t have to change the current setup tool context anymore. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Use the new get_registered_packages API in Zope 2.13+ to get the registered packages, instead of the _registered_packages attribute of the Products module. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Use the new get_registered_packages API in Zope 2.13+ to get the registered packages, instead of the _registered_packages attribute of the Products module. [davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Use the standard libraries doctest module. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: 표준 라이브러리 doctest 모듈을 사용하십시오. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Warning
trans-unit.target: 경고

trans-unit.source: We automatically create a GenericSetup snapshot before and after installation now, so you can at least compare the changes a product did during installation. We have no better uninstall yet, though. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: We automatically create a GenericSetup snapshot before and after installation now, so you can at least compare the changes a product did during installation. We have no better uninstall yet, though. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: When uninstalling always run a profile ‘uninstall’ if no other uninstall-method is found. Fixes https://github.com/plone/Products.CMFQuickInstallerTool/issues/4 [pbauer]
trans-unit.target: When uninstalling always run a profile ‘uninstall’ if no other uninstall-method is found. Fixes https://github.com/plone/Products.CMFQuickInstallerTool/issues/4 [pbauer]
